description: This file defines an Angular service called WishlistService, responsible for managing wishlist operations such as retrieving, adding, and removing products from a user's wishlist. It utilizes Angular's dependency injection to access HttpClient and UserContextService, and constructs API calls to the backend.

classes.name: WishlistService
classes.description: An Angular injectable service that interfaces with the backend to manage user wishlists.

methods.name: getWishlist
methods.description: Fetches the current wishlist for the user by sending a GET request to the backend.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a product to the wishlist by sending a POST request with the product ID.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a product from the wishlist by sending a DELETE request with the product ID.
